replies.author: 深拥v
replies.txt_content:
jerez/Xiangqian/XiangqianGui：
32行：itemMeta.setDisplayName(" xxxxx ");   点击吸收
47行：Inventory inventory = Main.thisplugin.getServer().createInventory(null, 54, " xxxxx ");       魂环吸收
